descr.p: Hint: In MSEgui, you would seldom use the TEdit component directly. Instead, in is recommended that you rather use one of the TDataEdit descendants, like TStringEdit, TIntegerEdit etc. They have the event properties OnSetValue and OnDataEntered which can be used in order to react on input changes.

element.name: tedit.onchange
element.short: Event handler for when the TEdit text changes

descr.p: Note: The OnChange event also fires when the form that contains the TEdit, is displayed for the first time. This is due to how MSEgui synchronises the streamed values from the *.mfm file.
